exceptions.exn: In environment q : R q' : 1 < q H : R -> Prop Unable to unify "Rabs ?M2363 < 1" with "exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> H x".
In environment q : R q' : 1 < q H : R -> Prop Unable to unify "?M2363 < ?M2364" with "exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> H x".
In environment q : R q' : 1 < q H : R -> Prop Unable to unify "R -> Prop" with "Rbar_locally p_infty H -> filtermap (fun n : nat => q ^ n) eventually H".

original: intros q H. apply is_lim_seq_geom. unfold Rabs. apply Rlt_gt. apply H.
